name: pnpm-power-menu
description: Customizable PNPM commands for VS Code üõ†Ô∏è

scripts.lint: echo Running tasks before lint... && eslint --ext .js,.ts
scripts.build: echo Running tasks before build... && webpack --mode production --devtool hidden-source-map
scripts.build:watch: echo Running tasks before build:watch... && webpack --watch
scripts.compile: echo Running tasks before compile... && copyfiles commands.yaml out/commands && tsc -p tsconfig.json
scripts.compile:tests: echo Running tasks before compile:tests... && copyfiles commands.yaml out/commands && tsc -p tsconfig.test.json --outDir out
scripts.test:setup: pnpm run compile:tests && pnpm run compile && pnpm run lint
scripts.test:watch: echo Running tasks before test:watch... && tsc -p . -w --outDir out
scripts.test:mocha: echo Running tasks before test:mocha... && mocha out/test/**/*.test.js --delay --ui=bdd
scripts.test:mocha:detailed: echo Running tasks before test:mocha:detailed... && mocha out/test/**/*.test.js --delay --ui=bdd --reporter list
scripts.test:vscode: echo Running tasks before test:vscode... && vscode-test
scripts.test:vscode:main: echo Running tasks before test:vscode:main... && vscode-test --config ./.vscode-test.mjs --label main
scripts.test:vscode:context: echo Running tasks before test:vscode:context... && vscode-test --config ./.vscode-test.contextmenu.mjs
scripts.prepublish: pnpm run lint && pnpm run test && pnpm run build
scripts.pack: echo Running tasks before pack... && vsce package
